description: Boomer, like the other boys, acts obnoxious, cheery and enjoys causing trouble. His hair style resembles the original Boomer`s hair style in his second appearance, although the anime Boomer`s hair is slightly longer and spikier. His attitude is the opposite of Miyako`s attitude. His weapon of choice is Miyako`s used cotton swab to toss his ear wax. He is represented by an X.
name: Boomer
